DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare clinical effect PEEK housing vs. metal housing term retention patient satisfaction
DOC.brief_title: ( PEEK ) Housing Verses Metallic Housing Ball Socket Attachment Retention Mandibular Overdenture
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient free systemic disease may interfere dental implant placement and/or osseointegration e.g . uncontrolled diabetes , hypertension , blood disease , bone disease , smoking.etc . 2 . Patients completely edentulous upper low arch . 3 . Patients healthy mucosa free ulceration , inflammation infection . 4 . All patient free neuromuscular temporomandibular joint disorder . 5 . Selected patient normal maxillomandibular relationship ( Angle class I ridge classification ) adequate interarch space normal tongue size . 1 . Patients limited manual dexterity . 2 . Patients Xerostomia , excessive salivation pathological mucosal change ( e.g . Lichen planus , Leukoplakiaâ€¦etc . ) 3 . Pregnant female . 4 . Un cooperative patient .
